mdRecord.dcterms:title: Emblemata / Andreae Alciati Iurusconsulti clarissimi
Alciati, Andrea, 1492-1550. Emblematum liber
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Alciati, Andrea, 1492-1550 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: With the exception of the Tabula (p. [1]-[4] at end), each page is enclosed within a four-part ornamental border. [original]
Woodcuts by Pierre Eskrich; some ornamental borders are signed PV, probably for Pierre Vase (i.e. Eskrich). Cf. Mortimer, R. French 16th cent. books, I, p. 16. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: First work in volume with: Emblemes d'Alciat. -- A Lyon, 1549. Unidentified ownership stamp on title page. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 400. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Emblems--Early works to 1800
